user_instruction: 'Tell John to compose an email to me (lisa@markethub.com) asking about potential discounts. Remind him he can check his MyDealFinder for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Lisa from MarketHub asked me to reach out. She’d love for you to send her a quick email (lisa@markethub.com) outlining the items you’re interested in so she can look into potential discounts for you.  
If it helps, you can also review your current offers in MyDealFinder first—there might be useful info you can include.

Thanks, and looking forward to hearing from you!

final_output:
Hi John,

Lisa from MarketHub asked me to reach out. She’d love for you to send her a quick email (lisa@markethub.com) outlining the items you’re interested in so she can look into potential discounts for you.  
If it helps, you can also review your current offers in MyDealFinder first—there might be useful info you can include.

Thanks, and looking forward to hearing from you!
